name: Penguins on Skis
description:
❆Penguins on Skis ☃

      ᴀ ɢᴀᴍᴇ ʙʏ Super-u and ғʀɪᴇᴢᴋɪɴɢ

          Instructions:

◆ Use your mouse or touchscreen to steer left and right.

◆ Don't hit the trees or the flags.

◆ Go in the direction that the flags tell you to go.

◆ Good luck! :)

           Credits:

◆ Music: Queen - Don't Stop Me Now.

◆ Sound Effects: Made by me in BFXR.

◆ Graphics: Made by me using Aseprite.
